name: The Roll Players
description:
12 Sessions | 6 Players | 1 Campaign

What happens when the worldâ€™s best improvisers decide to play an actual Dungeons & Dragons campaign, live on stage? You get The Roll Players, a show with authentic storytelling, where characters grow, laugh, and die (hopefully), with belly busting comedy created from the chaos! 

Dungeon Master: Kris Siddiqi
Players: Andy Hull, Sarah Hillier & Sharjil Rasool
NPCs: Aurora Browne, Lisa Merchant & Paul Bates
